nodes.text: Kelarea was a planet located in the Tynna sector of the Expansion Region.

During the Clone Wars, in 21 BBY, the Majestic traveled to Kelarea after it recovered the wreckage of TIV Z590/1 and the body of CT-1127/549. The Traffic Interdiction Vessel and the clone trooper pilot were both lost during a TIOPS mission conducted by Omega Squad at the nearby Corellian–Perlemian hyperspace intersection.
